keyMoments.title: Garp's Fleet Arrives at Water 7
keyMoments.description: Vice-Admiral Garp arrives at Water 7 with a Marine fleet, bringing Koby and Helmeppo.
keyMoments.significance: The Marines' arrival creates tension and disrupts the crew's peaceful recovery.

keyMoments.title: Crew Rests After Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat crew rests and recovers in Water 7 after the traumatic battle at Enies Lobby and loss of Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's need for recovery time after intense battles.

keyMoments.title: Crew Learns Luffy's Grandfather is a Marine Vice-Admiral
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats are shocked to learn that Luffy's grandfather is the legendary Marine Vice-Admiral Garp.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation that adds complexity to Luffy's background and the crew's relationship with the Marines.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
